text: COFFEE MATE French VanillaFeatures and Benefits
A delicious, French Vanilla flavoured coffee enhancer
A single tablespoon will transform your coffee into a rich and delicious treat
Classic vanilla taste that’s perfect in the morning, in the evening, or anytime!

Water, Sugars (Corn Syrup Solids, Maltodextrin), High Oleic Soy Oil, Dipotassium Phosphate, Modified Milk Ingredients, Mono- and Diglycerides, DATEM, Carrageenan, Sucralose, Artificial Flavour, Acesulfame-Potassium.

In 2023, we changed our Coffee Mate Liquid shrink sleeves so that the label no longer needs to be removed and discarded prior to recycling; now the entire bottle, sleeve and cap are recyclable together and can be put into the blue box
